reviews.review: piola

I love Dead By Daylight, it's a fantastic game to play with your friends regardless wether or not you're familiar with the perks. You get the hang of things pretty easy and every game has a different feel. It definately gives you a drive of wanting to do better the next round, and it's very addicting in my opinion. I highly suggest it for everyone!

Not finding this game as fun anymore and to me it's more of a side game, but i'm sure there are a lot of people out out there who would find this game fun, so I've recommended it to people and i hope people play this more.

this game is only fun when you are new. if you play long enough you see gaping balancing problems. the new mmr part makes this fact only worse. if you play mostly killer like me, and are half decent you will face 4 survivors that are super good and genrush you in 4 minutes. the casual fun of the game is only there in the lower parts. high tier is toxic and you have no way of getting out of high mmr. if you want only sweaty games then go for it.

This game is highkey awful, the devs dont know how the fuck to make a proper ranking system and tried to add skill based matchmaking but dont know how it actually works.  There's a constant imbalance on both sides and the only way you're winning is running the more broken perks/addons/etc.  Also losing 50 pips once a month is the WORST possible thing i have ever seen, that should never be in place.  And if it is the rank system needs to be revamped because you can at most get 2 pips per game and that is still 25 games to climb from the lowest to the second highest.  (Which wont happen).  I've put 5000 hours in and i regret every single hour i spent on this game.  I sincerely hope this game dies and the bhvr staff suffers the fate of telltale games.

Great Game!!!!!

Do yourself a favor and don't bother with the game unless you have friends who will also play the game with you. While it certainly has potential, its ultimately a poor execution of that potential. The developers legitimately don't seem to understand what statistics they should be using related to balance. They seem more interested in having new experiences then having a balanced core game play loop. The game often uses RNG as a means to balance which can produce "fair" games, but both sides get shafted doesn't produce an enjoyable experince. The solo survivor experience can be very frustrating due to the deliberate lack of communication between teammates and killer is frustrating at times due to premades being able to coordinate and punish any misuse of your time. The core map layouts very immensely in size which has an immense impact on how killers perform. While the map has standardized feature much of the layout is randomly generated and can produce scenarios were winning for one side is incredibly difficult (e.g. incredibly powerful tiles being generated next to other powerful tiles.) Many of the games perks end up being "gotchas" were the recipient is blindsided by them due to the lack of information (NOED, dead hard, unbreakable).

The game has the lack of features of a new indie game but its been out for 5 years. There isn't a match history system, replay system, and reporting players is a lot of effort to name just a few. As of writing this this the MMR is a hidden number. The devs use the excuse that knowing your MMR would make people more toxic people but this fundamentally fails to understand that people will justify their toxicity regardless of the scapegoat they choose. The devs Q and A process is terrible. There have been several patches this year that have been bug ridden with even previously fixed bugs reverted. The devs launch a PTB before a release and the problems highlighted day 1 of the PTB are often still in the launch version of the patch.

Overall the game game has potential but is in dire need of competition to give the devs a walk-up call.

I enjoy DBD a lot. Its a fun, koop game and as long as you have a non toxic lobby, Toxicity is common unfortunately, its a lot of fun. The most fun is definetely when you play with your friends. The various options you have in terms of cosmetics, different characters/Killers, maps and perk builds make every game different, which is very enjoyable.

Multijugador asimétrico en el cual cuatro supervivientes se enfrentar contra un asesino.

Repara generadores para poder escapar, pero cuidado por que si el asesino te atrapa, este te colgara, eres colgado tres veces y es game over.

Cuenta con slashers famosos, una jugabilidad que en tiempos podrá ser frustrante pero sigue siendo muy buena, muy recomendado.

игра умерла, хотя она и не рождалась, жесткие дисбаланс в игре, при чем не важно за кого вы играете, фул пати выживших развалит вас, что бы вы не делали. Чем больше в нее играю, тем больше понимаю что "разработчики" если их там можно назвать, зарабатывают только деньги, а какой то баланс вводить в игру, им даже это и не надо. Не я понимаю все сейчас зарабатывают, но так нагло я хз. Кроме дисбаланса, в игре куча читеров и багов, я не знаю как можно вообще за такую игру платить деньги, тем более "онлайн" (я брал на акции в 1ю годовщину игры на 2 или 3$) хотя надо сказать тогда даже было приятно играть чем сейчас, если вы хотите гореть от игры, тогда вам сюда, я думаю если бы в игре был "войс" она по токсичности была бы круче "доты" я не буду спойлерить для тех кто не играл и не буду так описывать все баги и читеры игроки которым про100 интересен такой гемплей. О чем можно говорить если тут даже не работает система репортов. Как можно эту игру как то комментировать и выражать свое мнение. я думаю мои 2000 в этом "если так можно выразиться игре" я могу сложить объективное мнение о игре так как прошел я с ней многое. Если кто то скажет почему играю? аналогов нормальных нет, да и со всего вышеперечисленного я не горю, почти) в любом случае я эту игру не рекомендую, но выбор за тобой.
